_meta.translator_notes: Base English accessibility features and descriptions

emergency_pause.name: Emergency Pause
emergency_pause.description: Instantly pause all activity with spacebar or emergency button
emergency_pause.instructions: Press spacebar or click the emergency button to pause everything immediately

calm_mode.name: Calm Mode
calm_mode.description: Reduces visual and auditory stimulation for a calmer experience
calm_mode.instructions: Enable to reduce animations, sounds, and visual complexity
calm_mode.benefits: Helps prevent overwhelm and supports focus

focus_mode.name: Focus Mode
focus_mode.description: Minimizes distractions and highlights essential elements
focus_mode.instructions: Activates simplified interface with clear focus indicators
focus_mode.benefits: Supports concentration and reduces cognitive load

high_contrast.name: High Contrast
high_contrast.description: Increases color contrast for better visibility
high_contrast.instructions: Enables high contrast color scheme for text and interface elements

large_text.name: Large Text
large_text.description: Increases text size throughout the interface
large_text.instructions: Makes all text larger and more readable
large_text.benefits: Supports vision differences and reading difficulties

reduce_motion.name: Reduce Motion
reduce_motion.description: Minimizes or eliminates animations and movement
reduce_motion.instructions: Reduces motion-based effects that may cause discomfort
reduce_motion.benefits: Prevents motion sensitivity and vestibular issues

screen_reader.name: Screen Reader Support
screen_reader.instructions: Enhanced semantic markup and aria labels for screen readers
screen_reader.benefits: Full access for blind and visually impaired users

keyboard_navigation.name: Keyboard Navigation
keyboard_navigation.instructions: Tab, arrow keys, enter, and escape provide full navigation
keyboard_navigation.benefits: Access for users who cannot use pointing devices

settings.title: Accessibility Settings
settings.description: Customize your experience for optimal accessibility

screen_reader.headings: Navigate by headings for quick access to sections
screen_reader.landmarks: Use landmarks to jump to main areas
screen_reader.skip_links: Skip links available to bypass navigation
screen_reader.alt_text: All images include descriptive alternative text
screen_reader.form_labels: All form controls have clear labels
screen_reader.status_updates: Live regions announce important status changes
screen_reader.error_messages: Clear error messages and correction guidance provided

motor_accessibility.large_targets: All interactive elements meet minimum touch target sizes
motor_accessibility.sticky_keys: Sticky keys and modifier key support
motor_accessibility.dwell_time: Adjustable dwell time for hover-based interactions
motor_accessibility.drag_alternatives: Alternative methods provided for drag operations
motor_accessibility.timeout_extensions: Session timeouts can be extended or disabled

cognitive_accessibility.progress_indicators: Clear progress indicators for multi-step processes
cognitive_accessibility.memory_support: Important information is persistent and retrievable

sensory_accessibility.audio_alternatives: Visual alternatives provided for all audio content
sensory_accessibility.visual_alternatives: Audio alternatives provided for visual content
sensory_accessibility.captions: Captions available for all video content
sensory_accessibility.volume_control: Independent volume controls for different audio types

customization.color_themes: Multiple color themes including high contrast options
customization.animation_control: Granular control over animations and transitions
customization.layout_options: Alternative layout options for different needs

assistive_technology.screen_readers: Compatible with JAWS, NVDA, VoiceOver, and TalkBack
assistive_technology.voice_control: Dragon NaturallySpeaking and voice control support
assistive_technology.alternative_keyboards: Support for alternative keyboard layouts and devices
